title: [SOLVED]820-2838-A, was liquid damaged, boots fine but no ASD ?
message:
Having just fixed up a liquid damaged 820-2838, I want to run ASD to check to see if there's any dud sensors I've missed (wouldn't surprise me).

I've tried 'D' and 'Option-D' during boot, even ctrl-D, no avail, both with, and without the SSD. Wifi works.

title: [SOLVED]820-2838-A, was liquid damaged, boots fine but no ASD ?
message:
I don’t think they were available that far back..?
Plus, those onboard/online tests don’t give much details. Use external OS ASD 3S142 for that model. (Late 2010, right?)

title: [SOLVED]820-2838-A, was liquid damaged, boots fine but no ASD ?
message: Right, more things to learn / expand-the-mind on.  Time to dig that one up and try make the boot drive for it.

title: [SOLVED]820-2838-A, was liquid damaged, boots fine but no ASD ?
message: Yeah this C2D old shit needs to run an actual ASD. Blast from the past.

title: [SOLVED]820-2838-A, was liquid damaged, boots fine but no ASD ?
message: ASD obtained and booted.  Nice "Passed" outcome.  Thanks all.
